title: EW-Shopp: Supporting Event and Weather-based Data Analytics and Marketing along the Shopper Journey

author: Matteo Palmonari, University of Milano - Bicocca

segmentation: OK, so good morning.
I am presenting EW Shop that's a hard zone 2020 project that started this January.
EW shop stands for supporting event and water based data analytics and marketing along the shopper journey.
That's our website.
It's an innovation project, so it's strongly driven by the end.
Strict So what?
Basically we want to do with this project.

We have like a business objective which is to increase the efficiency and competitiveness of companies that operate in several sectors like Commerce, retail and marketing industries, and in order to do that, what we want to do is build a platform that out to integrate the consumer and market data right so these data are produced across interactions through different channels and in different languages.
And we want to that this platform will provide insights, rich customer journey.
But beside that and this explains the title of the project that we want to enrich these company data.
This proprietary data of the company with external data that cannot be accessed today.
But those companies.
So in particular by weather information and information about events, why cause events and weather have?
A strong impact on consumer choices, right?
So just.
To give you a very simple example, we want to help this company to build a services that help them advertise bicycle equipment order on Sunday afternoons during the Tour de France.
OK, so this is a big cause.
You learn that there are dependencies between the events and weather and customer choices based on previous analysis that you build through the technology of the project, right?

And then of course, the last objective is to make up for the story is to make up for the lack of knowledge, technology and resources that these companies suffer from compared to big IT Giants like Amazon and so on and so forth.
So this is really needed to bring companies into the data driven economy.
So how the consortium is shaped?

Basically we have several industrial partners in these complicated value constellations, so we have industries from the retailer market like Big Bang, one of the larger consumer electronics retailer in Slovenia.
Then we have a shopping comparison shopping platform like it's in a game from Slovenia.
Then we have a digital advertising.

Agencies, like JT from Spain and then we have also the companies that provide technologies to companies working in this domain, like for example browser tell measurements which performs location intelligence for physical stores engineering which is consultancy company and then we have JFK which is the largest market research company and that of course we also have some technology providers which explains why.
We also researchers are in this project which had this company to build the technology that they need to build those services.
So if you.

One if we want to take a look at the project that they approach at a glance, we can basically see that may end of this project is to produce value and the value is produced through marketable services in different business cases like the consumer journey, data integration, location, scouting, so location intelligence for physical stores, even based sales analysis and digital marketing campaigns based.
On events and weather driven.

Analysis These services have to be built starting from some data sources, which of course comprise consumer and market data that are provided by the companies in the consortium, but also include external data such as a weather data, media product, San category information an.
Of course, the linked open data cloud.
So one approach of the project is to model some of these core data that are.

Alpha to support the integration so that then we can build a data integration layer which integrates some existing technologies which basically perform data transformation data on sting quality assessment and so on and so forth.
So this is a sex minutes.
I know an analytics, an A visualization layer.
What we can offer a platform with several components.
You will see these in the poster to tomorrow.
If you come by and use cases of real world data and if you want data.
But based on bilateral agreement 'cause many of the data that we manage, our proprietary of the companies.
What we search more data.
Entity Core core resolution tool if you have them, an exchange of knowledge with projects and groups with similar.
Potters, that's how to get in touch with us.
Sorry for the 30 seconds late.
OK, thank you.
